title: Spring Split
body: When will the Spring Split Schedule will be release?

replies.body: I'm not sure, but I'd keep an eye on the [**eSports Page**](http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/articles) for more information as it becomes available. ^.^
They usually post the schedule when it is a few weeks out and I would keep an eye on the official esports [page](http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/).
